product_name: Repel Natural Insect Repellent Pump Spray - 6 fl. oz.
long_description: Don't let annoying mosquitoes ruin your day outdoors. DEET-free Repel Natural Insect Repellent Pump spray keeps bugs away for up to 2 hrs. DEET-free formula contains active ingredients geraniol, soybean oil, sodium lauryl sulfate and potassium sorbate. Effectively repels mosquitoes for up to 2 hrs.
short_description: Don't let annoying mosquitoes ruin your day outdoors. DEET-free Repel Natural Insect Repellent Pump spray keeps bugs away for up to 2 hrs.
